- [93mUse[0m and [93mApplication[0m of [93mmHealth[0m [93mTechnologies[0m in [93mPerioperative[0m [93mSurgical[0m [93mCare[0m: [93mNarrative[0m [93mReview[0m.: [93mBackground[0m: [93mSurgical[0m [93mprocedures[0m and [93mtheir[0m [93mpotential[0m [93mcomplications[0m [93mplace[0m [93msubstantial[0m [93mstrain[0m on [93mpatients[0m, [93mclinicians[0m, and [93mhealth[0m [93mcare[0m [92msystems[0m. These [93mstrains[0m are [93mdriven[0m by the [93manticipated[0m [93mmorbidity[0m and [93mmortality[0m, so that [93mthere[0m is [93mresource[0m-[93mintensive[0m [93mpostoperative[0m [93minpatient[0m [33mmanagement[0m. [93mGiven[0m the [93mconcentration[0m of [93msurgical[0m [93mservices[0m within [93mhospital[0m [93msettings[0m, [93mcurrent[0m [93mstandard[0m [93mlevels[0m of [93mcare[0m [93mhave[0m [93mlimitations[0m [93msuch[0m as [93mcommunication[0m [93mgaps[0m, [93mtime[0m [93mlapses[0m before [93mevaluation[0m, and [93minvestment[0m of [93mresources[0m, which [93mlimit[0m [93maccessibility[0m and [93mgenerate[0m [93mdisparities[0m in [93mdelivery[0m of [93mcare[0m. [93mHowever[0m, [93mrecent[0m [93madvances[0m in [93mdigital[0m [93mhealth[0m, [93mincluding[0m [93mtelemedicine[0m [92mplatforms[0m, [93mmobile[0m [93mhealth[0m ([93mmHealth[0m), and [93mwearable[0m [93mtechnologies[0m, [93mpresent[0m an [93mopportunity[0m to [93mdecentralize[0m and [93mextend[0m [93mperioperative[0m [93mcare[0m into [93mcommunity[0m [93msettings[0m. This [93mreview[0m [95mexplored[0m how [93mestablished[0m [93mmHealth[0m [93mtechnologies[0m are being [95mintegrated[0m into the [93mperioperative[0m [91mpathway[0m and [93mtheir[0m [93mimpact[0m on [93msurgical[0m [93mcare[0m [93mdelivery[0m and [93moutcomes[0m. It [93malso[0m [93mhighlights[0m [93mpossible[0m [93memerging[0m [92mmodels[0m of [93mremote[0m [93mphysician[0m and [93mpatient[0m [93minteraction[0m where [93mbenefits[0m [93mseem[0m to be [93moutweighing[0m the [93mrisks[0m. [93mObjective[0m: The [93maim[0m of this [93mnarrative[0m [93mreview[0m was to [93mpresent[0m [93mcollected[0m [93mevidence[0m for the [93muse[0m of [93mestablished[0m [93mmHealth[0m [93mtechnologies[0m in the [93msurgical[0m [91mpathway[0m of [93mpatients[0m and [93mhighlight[0m [93mtheir[0m [93mreadiness[0m and [93mpotential[0m in [92mmodels[0m of [93mstandard[0m [93mcare[0m. [93mMethods[0m: A [93mcomprehensive[0m [93mliterature[0m [93msearch[0m was [93mconducted[0m [93macross[0m [93mMEDLINE[0m ([93mvia[0m [93mPubMed[0m), [93mWeb[0m of [93mScience[0m, and [93mScopus[0m [93mdatabases[0m between [93mOctober[0m [93m2022[0m and [93mMay[0m [93m2024[0m. [93mAdditional[0m [94msources[0m were [93midentified[0m through [93mreference[0m [93mlist[0m [93mscreening[0m of [93mrelevant[0m [93msystematic[0m [93mreviews[0m. [93mData[0m were [93mextracted[0m and [93manalyzed[0m [93mbased[0m on [93msurgical[0m [93mspecialty[0m, [93mtype[0m of [93mmHealth[0m [93mintervention[0m, [93mcost[0m-[93meffectiveness[0m, and [93methical[0m [93mconsiderations[0m. [93mFindings[0m were [93msummarized[0m in [93mtables[0m to [93millustrate[0m [93mkey[0m [93mtrends[0m and [93mvariations[0m [93macross[0m [93mstudies[0m. The [93mextracted[0m [93mdata[0m were [93mtabulated[0m and [93mdescribed[0m [93mqualitatively[0m to [93mhighlight[0m [93msimilarities[0m, [93mdifferences[0m, and [93mpossible[0m [93memerging[0m [93mtrends[0m [93macross[0m the [93mstudies[0m. [93mResults[0m: A [93mtotal[0m of [93m28[0m [93marticles[0m [93mpublished[0m between [93m2008[0m and [93m2022[0m were [93mincluded[0m for [93mqualitative[0m [93manalysis[0m, with [93mmost[0m ([93mn[0m=[93m21[0m, [93m75[0m%) [93moriginating[0m from the [93mUnited[0m [93mStates[0m, [93mGermany[0m, and the [93mUnited[0m [93mKingdom[0m. The [93mstudy[0m [92mdesigns[0m were [93mpredominantly[0m [93mrandomized[0m [93mcontrolled[0m [93mtrials[0m ([93mn[0m=[93m9[0m, [93m32[0m%) and [93mobservational[0m [93mstudies[0m ([93mn[0m=[93m8[0m, [93m29[0m%). [93mCollectively[0m, these [93mstudies[0m [93minvolved[0m [93m6344[0m [93mpatients[0m [93mundergoing[0m [93mmHealth[0m-[93mbased[0m [93mperioperative[0m [93minterventions[0m [93mprimarily[0m in [93mgeneral[0m [93msurgery[0m, [93morthopedics[0m, and [93moncology[0m. [93mInterventions[0m [93mfrequently[0m [93mused[0m [93msmartphones[0m ([93mn[0m=[93m10[0m, [93m36[0m%) and [93mwearable[0m [93mdevices[0m, [93moften[0m in [93mcombination[0m with [93mother[0m [93mtracking[0m and [93mmeasuring[0m [92msystems[0m. [93mApplications[0m [93mincluded[0m [93mwound[0m [93mmonitoring[0m, [93mpostoperative[0m [93mfollow[0m-up, and [93mpatient[0m [93meducation[0m. [93mData[0m [93mcollection[0m was [93mmultimodal[0m and [93mtypically[0m [93mconducted[0m [93mdaily[0m, [93myet[0m only [93m36[0m% ([93m10[0m/[93m28[0m) of the [93marticles[0m [93mreported[0m [93mdefined[0m [93mfollow[0m-up [93mperiods[0m. [93mCost[0m-[93meffectiveness[0m was [93mrarely[0m [93massessed[0m, with only [93m4[0m% ([93m1[0m/[93m28[0m) of the [93marticles[0m [93mreporting[0m [93mper[0m-[93mpatient[0m [93msavings[0m. [93mOverall[0m, [93m64[0m% ([93m18[0m/[93m28[0m) of the [93marticles[0m were [93mrated[0m as [93mlow[0m [93mquality[0m [93mdue[0m to [93mmethodological[0m [93mlimitations[0m. [93mConclusions[0m: [93mmHealth[0m- and [93mtelehealth[0m-[93mbased[0m [93minterventions[0m [93mshow[0m [93mpromise[0m in [93menhancing[0m [93maspects[0m of [93mperioperative[0m [93mcare[0m by [93menabling[0m [93mremote[0m [93mmonitoring[0m, [93mpatient[0m [93mengagement[0m, and [93mimproved[0m [93mcare[0m [93mcontinuity[0m. [93mFuture[0m [93mresearch[0m [93mshould[0m [93mfocus[0m on [93mscalable[0m [93mimplementation[0m, [93mtrue[0m [93mcost[0m-[93meffectiveness[0m [93manalysis[0m, [93mequitable[0m [93maccess[0m, and [93mintegration[0m into [93mclinical[0m [93mworkflows[0m to [93mensure[0m [93mbroad[0m [93mapplicability[0m in [93mcurrent[0m [92mmodels[0m of [93mcare[0m.

- [93mAccurate[0m [93mnoncovalent[0m [93minteractions[0m in [93matomistic[0m [92msystems[0m [93mvia[0m [93mquantum[0m [93mDrude[0m [93moscillators[0m.: [93mAccurately[0m [92mmodeling[0m [93mpolarization[0m and [93mvan[0m [93mder[0m [93mWaals[0m ([93mvdW[0m) [93minteractions[0m in [93matomistic[0m [92msystems[0m [93mtypically[0m [93mrequires[0m [93mhigh[0m-[93mlevel[0m [93mquantum[0m-[93mmechanical[0m [93mmethods[0m that are [93mcomputationally[0m [93mexpensive[0m, [93mhence[0m [93mlimited[0m in [93mapplicability[0m. To [93maddress[0m this [93mchallenge[0m, [93mefficient[0m [93myet[0m [93mphysically[0m [93mgrounded[0m [92mmodels[0m are [93mneeded[0m-[93mones[0m that not only [93menable[0m [93maccurate[0m [93mpredictions[0m but [93malso[0m [93mprovide[0m [93minsight[0m into how [93mnoncovalent[0m [93minteractions[0m [93mscale[0m in [93mcomplex[0m [93mmolecular[0m and [93mmaterial[0m [92msystems[0m. This [93mreview[0m [93mhighlights[0m the [93mquantum[0m [93mDrude[0m [93moscillator[0m ([93mQDO[0m) [92mmodel[0m, a [93mphysically[0m [93mmotivated[0m and [93mcomputationally[0m [93mefficient[0m [92mframework[0m that [93mcaptures[0m the [93messential[0m [93mfeatures[0m of [93melectronic[0m [93mresponse[0m, [93mincluding[0m [93mpolarization[0m and [93mdispersion[0m [93mforces[0m, [93macross[0m a [93mwide[0m [93mrange[0m of [93mchemical[0m and [93mmaterial[0m [92msystems[0m. [93mWe[0m [93mdiscuss[0m how the [93mQDO[0m [92mmodel[0m [93mquantitatively[0m [93mreproduces[0m the [93mpolarization[0m [93mresponse[0m of [93mmany[0m-[93melectron[0m [93matoms[0m and how [93mkey[0m [93mcomponents[0m of [93mnoncovalent[0m [93minteractions[0m-[93mexchange[0m-[93mrepulsion[0m, [93mpolarization[0m, and [93mdispersion[0m-[93memerge[0m [93mnaturally[0m in [93mQDO[0m [93mdimers[0m. [93mFurthermore[0m, the [92mmodel[0m [93mprovides[0m [93mpredictive[0m [93mscaling[0m [93mlaws[0m that [93melucidate[0m [93mtrends[0m in [93mpolarizability[0m and [93mdispersion[0m [93macross[0m the [93mperiodic[0m [93mtable[0m and in [93mmolecular[0m [93massemblies[0m. By [93muniting[0m [93minterpretability[0m, [93maccuracy[0m, and [93mefficiency[0m, the [93mQDO[0m [92mmodel[0m [93moffers[0m a [93mversatile[0m [93mapproach[0m for [92mmodeling[0m [93mnoncovalent[0m [93minteractions[0m in [92msystems[0m [93mranging[0m from [93misolated[0m [93mmolecules[0m to [93mcomplex[0m [93mcondensed[0m [93mphases[0m and [93mnanostructured[0m [93mmaterials[0m.

- [93mAnalysis[0m of the [93mpost[0m-[93mincorporation[0m [93mperiod[0m of [93mhealth[0m [93mtechnologies[0m [93mincorporated[0m into the [93mSUS[0m, from [93m2012[0m to [93m2022[0m.: [93mObjective[0m: To [93manalyze[0m the [93mtime[0m [93melapsed[0m in the [93mpost[0m-[93mincorporation[0m [93mprocess[0m of [93mprocedures[0m, [93morthoses[0m, [93mprostheses[0m, and [93mspecial[0m [93mmaterials[0m, with a [93mfocus[0m on [93mcompliance[0m with the [93mlegal[0m [93mdeadline[0m of [93m180[0m [93mdays[0m [93mestablished[0m for the [93mprovision[0m of the [93mtechnology[0m. [93mMethods[0m: The [93manalysis[0m was [93mconducted[0m with [93mprocedures[0m and [93morthoses[0m, [93mprostheses[0m, and [93mspecial[0m [93mmaterials[0m [93mrecommended[0m for [93mincorporation[0m by the [93mNational[0m [93mCommission[0m for the [93mIncorporation[0m of [93mTechnologies[0m from [93m2012[0m to [93m2022[0m, and the [93mtechnology[0m [93midentification[0m [93mcode[0m [93mcreated[0m in the [33mManagement[0m [92mSystem[0m for the [93mTable[0m of [93mProcedures[0m, [93mMedicines[0m, [93mOrthoses[0m, [93mProstheses[0m and [93mSpecial[0m [93mMaterials[0m of the [93mBrazilian[0m [93mUnified[0m [93mHealth[0m [92mSystem[0m, after [93mincorporation[0m. For the [93mtechnologies[0m [93midentified[0m, [93mwe[0m [93mcalculated[0m the [93mmedian[0m [93mperiods[0m ([93mQ1[0m-[93mQ3[0m) of the [93mdays[0m [93melapsed[0m during the [93mincorporation[0m and [93mpost[0m-[93mincorporation[0m [93mperiods[0m. In [93maddition[0m, the [93mproportion[0m of [93mtechnologies[0m [93moffered[0m [93maccording[0m to the [93mlegal[0m [93mdeadline[0m was [93mverified[0m, and the [93minfluence[0m of [93mvariables[0m on the [93mpost[0m-[93mincorporation[0m [93mperiod[0m was [93manalyzed[0m. [93mResults[0m: Among [93m41[0m [93mreports[0m on [93mprocedures[0m, [93morthoses[0m, [93mprostheses[0m, and [93mspecial[0m [93mselected[0m [93mmaterials[0m, [93m79[0m [93mtechnologies[0m were [93manalyzed[0m. The [93mcoding[0m [93mperiod[0m, [93mdefined[0m as the [93mbenchmark[0m for the [93msupply[0m of the [93mtechnology[0m, [93mhad[0m a [93mmedian[0m of [93m204[0m ([93m57[0m-[93m425[0m) [93mdays[0m. This [93mperiod[0m was [93mlonger[0m than [93m180[0m [93mdays[0m in [93m64[0m% of the [93mtechnologies[0m [93massessed[0m. [93mVariables[0m [93msuch[0m as the [93morganization[0m [93mgroup[0m to which the [93mtechnology[0m [93mbelongs[0m, [93mindication[0m of the [93mneed[0m to [93madapt[0m for [93mimplementation[0m in the [93mincorporation[0m [93mreport[0m, and [93mdelay[0m in the [93mevaluation[0m [93mperiod[0m for [93mincorporation[0m [93mseem[0m to [93minfluence[0m the [93mperiod[0m for [93mproviding[0m the [93mtechnology[0m. [93mConclusions[0m: The [93meffective[0m [93mprovision[0m of [93mtechnologies[0m [93mincorporated[0m into the [93mhealth[0m [92msystem[0m in [93mBrazil[0m [93mhas[0m not [93moccurred[0m within the [93mexpected[0m [93mperiod[0m of [93m180[0m [93mdays[0m in [93mmost[0m [93mcases[0m, which [93mlimits[0m [93mtheir[0m [93maccessibility[0m to the [93mpopulation[0m. [93mAnticipating[0m the [93mneed[0m for [93madaptation[0m before [93mimplementation[0m, even during [93mincorporation[0m, [93mseems[0m to be a [93mway[0m of [93mreducing[0m the [93mpost[0m-[93mincorporation[0m [93mperiod[0m.
- A [93mlong[0m-[93mterm[0m [93mdataset[0m of [93mmaize[0m [93mphenology[0m [93mobservations[0m from [93magrometeorological[0m [93mstations[0m in [93mNortheast[0m [93mChina[0m ([93m1981[0m-[93m2024[0m).: [93mWe[0m [93mpresent[0m a [93mmeticulously[0m [93mcurated[0m, [93mlong[0m-[93mterm[0m ([93m1981[0m-[93m2024[0m) [93mdataset[0m [93mdocumenting[0m [93mmaize[0m [93mphenology[0m [93mdynamics[0m [93macross[0m [93mNortheast[0m [93mChina[0m, the [93mnation[0m'[93ms[0m [93mmost[0m [93mcritical[0m [93mcommercial[0m [93mgrain[0m [93mbase[0m. [93mDerived[0m from [93m61[0m [93mnational[0m [93magrometeorological[0m [93mstations[0m, it [93mcaptures[0m the [93mtiming[0m of [93m10[0m [93mpivotal[0m [93mphenological[0m [93mstages[0m ([93msowing[0m, [93memergence[0m, [93mthree[0m-[93mleaf[0m, [93mseven[0m-[93mleaf[0m, [93mjointing[0m, [93mtasseling[0m, [93mflowering[0m, [93msilking[0m, [93mmilking[0m, [93mmaturity[0m) and [93mderives[0m the [93mdurations[0m of [93m4[0m [93mgrowth[0m [93mperiod[0m [93mlengths[0m ([93msowing[0m-[93mjointing[0m, [93mjointing[0m-[93msilking[0m, [93msilking[0m-[93mmaturity[0m, [93msowing[0m-[93mmaturity[0m). The [93mdataset[0m [93munderwent[0m a [93mrigorous[0m, [93mmulti[0m-[93mtiered[0m [93mquality[0m [93mcontrol[0m [93mprotocol[0m, [93mincluding[0m [93mautomated[0m [93mchecks[0m for [93minternal[0m [93mconsistency[0m and [93mexpert[0m [93marbitration[0m for [93mambiguous[0m [93mrecords[0m, [93mensuring[0m [93mhigh[0m [93mintegrity[0m. [93mSubsequent[0m [93manalysis[0m [93memployed[0m [93mkernel[0m [93mdensity[0m [93mestimation[0m to [93mcharacterize[0m the [93mprobability[0m [93mdistribution[0m of [93mphenological[0m [93mevents[0m and [93munivariate[0m [93mlinear[0m [93mregression[0m to [93mquantify[0m [93mdecadal[0m [93mtrends[0m. The [93mresulting[0m [93mrepository[0m is [93msubstantial[0m, [93mcomprising[0m [93m976[0m [93mgeoreferenced[0m [93mdiagnostic[0m [93mplots[0m in [93mJPEG[0m [93mformat[0m and [93mtwo[0m [93mprimary[0m [93mdata[0m [93mtables[0m in [93mXLSX[0m [93mformat[0m, with a [93mtotal[0m [93mvolume[0m of [93m601[0m.[93m04[0m [93mMB[0m. [93mSystematically[0m [93morganized[0m by [93mprovince[0m and [93mstation[0m, this [93mdataset[0m [93mserves[0m as a [93mfoundational[0m [93mempirical[0m [93mresource[0m for [93mquantifying[0m [93mclimate[0m-[93mdriven[0m [93mshifts[0m in [93mcrop[0m [93mdevelopment[0m, [93menhancing[0m the [93mparameterization[0m and [93mvalidation[0m of [93mprocess[0m-[93mbased[0m [93mcrop[0m [92mmodels[0m, and [93minforming[0m the [93mdevelopment[0m of [93moptimized[0m [93mcultivation[0m [93mpractices[0m and [93mregional[0m [93mclimate[0m [93madaptation[0m [93mframeworks[0m.
